description.@en: My friends don’t follow me for a paycheck; they follow me for my leadership, charisma and camaraderie I have fostered among them.

system.notes: Every Profession possesses a unique knack, an ability that no other Profession has access to. The Trait immediately follows the Profession’s description.

effect.@en: Select one ally as combat begins. You both gain a +10% Base Chance to Defend and cannot be Flanked, providing you are able to clearly see and hear one another.
